onboarding_description_1: Quickly trigger an emergency alert to contacts and authorities.
onboarding_description_2: Share your real-time location with those you trust.
onboarding_description_3: Set risk zones and receive alerts to avoid accidents.
permissions_description: Allow access for the app to work properly and help with your safety.
permissions_description_1: Allow access to calculate routes and ensure safety.
permissions_description_2: Receive updates on rides and deliveries.
permissions_description_3: Required for voice calls with the driver.
